name: Simple Character 2000 Series Vol. 09: Tsurikichi Sanpei: The Tsuri
overview: Simple Characters 2000 Series vol.09 - Tsuri Kichi Sanpei - The Tsuri is a fishing game based on the anime, the gameplay is in first person perspective, the game features different fishing spots. How to fish: Cast the rod and wait until the lure move, then press Circle Button to start trying to catch the fish, to reel use the Circle Button and try that the line doesn't cut.
